description: Fixed recall tool date parsing to accept datetime without timezone (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS) and default to local machine time. Followed TDD: wrote failing test, fixed parse_date_to_timestamp function to handle three formats (YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS local, YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ UTC), verified all 4 tests pass. Updated tool description and struct field documentation. Also fixed /recall slash command to append Z for UTC timezone.
